Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: `db_dump wallet.dat`

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: will tell you some stats about it

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content:
```
db_dump dn2id.dbb
VERSION=3
format=bytevalue
type=btree
db_pagesize=4096
HEADER=END
DATA=END
```

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: verify that you see VERSION=10 with that util

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: VERSION=10 is like, the future. Bitcoin forks use version 4, as far as I know
